Welcome to Islands and Bridges, also known as Hashikakewero 
 The rules of the game: 
 Connect islands (the circles with numbers) with as many bridges as the number in the island.
1.There can be no more than two bridges between two islands.

2. Bridges cannot go across islands or other bridges.

3. The bridges will form a continuous link between all the islands.

4. You can use two bridges from one Island

5. Have Fun!
